Package game.environments

Class SpawningGround

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.positions.Ground
game.environments.spawningenvironments.SpawningGround
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Graveyard, GustOfWind, PuddleOfWater
public abstract class SpawningGround
extends Ground
A class that represents the abstract class SpawningGround, representing all ground that will spawn an actor.

    • addActorThatSpawns

      public void addActorThatSpawns​(Actor actor, int actorSpawnChance)
      Adds an actor that spawns from the SpawningGround
      Parameters:
      actor - actor that spawns
      actorSpawnChance - the chance of the actor spawning from 0 to 100

    • getActorsThatSpawn

      Returns:
      hashmap of actors that spawn

    • tick

      public void tick​(Location location)
      Iterates over the actorsThatSpawn HashMap at each turn. If the location doesn't contain an actor, then potentially spawn an actor at that location.
      Overrides:
      tick in class Ground
      Parameters:
      location - The location of the SpawningGround

    • spawnActor

      public abstract void spawnActor​(Actor actor, Location location)
      A factory method to spawn actors depending on their chance of spawning and the location on the map.
      Parameters:
      actor - actor that may potentially spawn
      location - location where the actor will spawn
